sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function ChargerCardModal({ charger, onClose }) { if (!charger) return null; return (

{charger.name}

{(charger.connectors || []).map(conn => (
Conector: {conn.connectorId}
Estado: {conn.status}
Minutos: {conn.accumulatedMinutes || 0}
Sesiones: {conn.sessionCount || '-'}
Tipo: {conn.type}
Potencia: {conn.power} kW
))}
); }
